entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
